title: Activating Faith Instead of Fear | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Activating Faith Instead of Fear | Joel Osteen
description:
Faith and fear have something in common. They both ask us to believe something is going to happen that we cannot see. Instead of using your energy to worry, use it to believe. God is going to turn things around in your favor.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
